Key Match Events: Ireland won the match by 5 runs (DLS method)
Pre-Game Insights: England are firm favourites for Ireland clash despite misfiring top four
Alex Hales has a prime opportunity to rediscover the form on Australian soil
Andy Balbirnie's quick-fire 37 off 23 balls against West Indies hinted at the Ireland captain playing a key role in his side's fortunes
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ireland are yet to win a match batting first in T20 World Cup history
England have hit a six once every 17 balls in T20Is since 2021, a record bettered only by India
Others: The MCG pitch offered some vicious pace and bounce during the India vs Pakistan fixture
Rain forecast for the afternoon and evening in Melbourne, swing could play a part too
